Treatments

We offer advanced technology treatments that utilize high end equipment: microcurrent, high frequency current, ultrasound, low intensity radio frequency, and microdermabrasion. These anti- aging methods combat fine lines, wrinkles, sagging skin, hyperpigmented areas and small imperfections of the skin.

Facials

We support and maintain healthy skin with our signature Organic Rose facial and palette of various happy aging and acne correcting facials. We utilize skin care products that are made with truly natural ingredients that make an excellent choice for revitalizing and regenerating mature and aging skin.

Well-being

We take care of your well-being by providing ancient, hands-on healing method called Reiki and Crystal Back massage that helps with muscle tension and energy healing. Reiki helps with stress related issues, mental clarity, emotional blockages and contributes to feelings of peace, relaxation and security.

There can be no better gift, or gift in return, then to touch another and to be touched, for by doing so we foster a world rich in empathy, understanding and compassion Michael Gienger
